common.appDescription: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes

home.title: Quiz Master
home.subtitle: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes

review.title: Quiz Review
review.perfectScore: Perfect! You got all questions correct!
review.question: Question

history.title: Quiz History
history.noAttempts: You haven't completed any quizzes yet

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve by reporting errors or suggesting new quizzes
feedback.feedbackSubmitted: Your feedback has been submitted successfully.

upload.title: Upload a Quiz
upload.subtitle: Add a new quiz by uploading a text file or pasting quiz content
upload.quizAdded: Your quiz has been added successfully.
upload.invalidFormat: Invalid quiz format. Please check the format and try again. Quiz must have a title and at least one question.
upload.placeholderContent:
Title: My Quiz
Description: A brief description
---
Q1: What is the capital of France?
A) London
B) Paris
C) Berlin
D) Madrid
Correct: B
---
Q2: Next question?
A) Option A
B) Option B
C) Option C
D) Option D
Correct: A
formatRules: Start with Title: Your Quiz Title
Options: A) Option, B) Option, etc.

validation.quizMustHaveQuestions: Quiz must have at least one question
validation.questionMustHaveOptions: Each question must have text, options, and a correct answer
validation.minimumOptions: Each question must have at least 2 options
validation.correctAnswerMustBeOption: Correct answer must be one of the options
